#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t, a, b, c, d, p;
    cin>>t;
    for( p=0; p<t; p++)
    {
         cin>>a>>b;
         int area = a*b;
         int x, y;
         cin>>x>>y;
         int area1 = x*y;
         while( area>0 )
                 area -= area1;
         if( area == 0 )
             cout<<"yes"<<endl;
         else
             cout<<"no"<<endl;    
    }
    return 0;
}
